original_text: ‘A terrible thing has happened to us! 10: These are probably the words of Jeremiah. Or they may be the words of Jerusalem's people. We have received a very bad wound. We thought, “We are very ill, but one day we will get better.” ‘A terrible thing has happened to us! 10: These are probably the words of Jeremiah. Or they may be the words of Jerusalem's people. We have received a very bad wound. We thought, “We are very ill, but one day we will get better.” ‘A terrible thing has happened to us!
korean_text: 슬프다 내 상처여 내가 중상을 당하였도다 그러나 내가 말하노라 이는 참으로 고난이라 내가 참아야 하리로다

sentences.original_text: A terrible thing has happened to us!
These are probably the words of Jeremiah.
Or they may be the words of Jerusalem's people.
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 예루살렘 사람들의 말일 수도 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: We have received a very bad wound.
but one day we will get better.
A terrible thing has happened to us!
